scene_description_enriched: Four winged putti are depicted in a celestial setting against a starry blue background. The central figure, a child with a halo and radiating light, sits on a red, patterned cushion, holding a globe and a cross. To the left, another child plays a lute, while a third child above plays a similar instrument. A fourth child sits to the right, holding a stringed instrument. A red banner unfurls above them, inscribed with Latin text: "OMNIS SPVS LAVDET DOMINVM" (All spirits praise the Lord). The scene evokes a heavenly choir celebrating divine praise.
